    • Method Detail

      • setMinCacheSpace

        public GfyCoreInitializationBuilder setMinCacheSpace(long megabytes)
        Set minimum storage space for Gfycat cache folder
        Parameters:
        megabytes - Amount of megabytes minimum. Can not be lower then DefaultDiskCache#MIN_POSSIBLE_SPACE_MB

      • setMaxCacheSpace

        public GfyCoreInitializationBuilder setMaxCacheSpace(long megabytes)
        Set maximum storage space for Gfycat cache folder
        Parameters:
        megabytes - Amount of megabytes maximum. Can not be lower then DefaultDiskCache#MIN_POSSIBLE_SPACE_MB

      • setCacheFolder

        public GfyCoreInitializationBuilder setCacheFolder(File cacheFolder)
                                            throws GfyCoreInitializationBuilder.CacheFolderDoesNotExist,
                                                   GfyCoreInitializationBuilder.CacheFolderIsNotDirectory
        Force gfycat to use cache folder provided by application.
        Parameters:
        cacheFolder - application defined cache folder.
        Throws:
        GfyCoreInitializationBuilder.CacheFolderDoesNotExist - if provided path does not exist.
        GfyCoreInitializationBuilder.CacheFolderIsNotDirectory - if provided path is not directory.

      • setDropUserRelatedContentCallback

        public GfyCoreInitializationBuilder setDropUserRelatedContentCallback(rx.functions.Action0 dropUserRelatedContent)
        Subscribe for user sign out if any extra actions needed for proper user data removal.
        Parameters:
        dropUserRelatedContent - callback called on user sign out.
